data.text: Ɔbea nyansafo si ne dan,
Nea ne nantew teɛ no suro Awurade,
Ɔkwasea kasa ma wɔbɔ nʼakyi abaa,
Faako a anantwi nni no, adididaka no mu da mpan,
Ɔdanseni nokwafo rennaadaa,
Ɔfɛwdifo hwehwɛ nyansa nanso onya,
Twe wo ho fi ɔkwasea ho,
Anitewfo nyansa ne sɛ wɔbɛdwene wɔn akwan ho,
Nkwaseafo de bɔne ho adwensakra di fɛw,
Koma biara nim ɔyaw wɔ ne mu,
Wɔbɛsɛe amumɔyɛfo fi,
Ɔkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɛteɛ wɔ onipa ani so,
Ɔserew mu mpo, koma tumi di yaw,
Akyirisanfo benya akatua sɛnea wɔn akwan te,
Atetekwaa gye biribiara di,
Onyansafo suro Awurade na oguan bɔne,
Onipa a ne bo nkyɛ fuw no yɛ nkwaseade,
Ntetekwaafo agyapade ne gyimi,
Nnipa bɔnefo bɛkotow nnipa pa anim,
Ahiafo de, wɔn yɔnkonom mpo mpɛ wɔn anim ahwɛ,
Nea obu ne yɔnko animtiaa yɛ bɔne,
So wɔn a wɔbɔ pɔw bɔne nyera kwan ana?
Adwumadenyɛ nyinaa de mfaso ba,
Anyansafo ahonya ne wɔn abotiri,
Ɔdanseni nokwafo gye nkwa,
Nea osuro Awurade no wɔ bammɔ a mu yɛ den,
Awurade suro yɛ nkwa asuti,
Ɔman mu nnipa dodow yɛ ɔhene anuonyam,
Onipa a ɔwɔ abodwokyɛre wɔ ntease a mu dɔ,
Koma mu asomdwoe ma nipadua nkwa,
Nea ɔhyɛ ahiafo so no bu wɔn Yɛfo animtiaa,
Sɛ amanehunu ba a amumɔyɛfo hwe ase,
Nyansa te ntease koma mu,
Trenee pagyaw ɔman,
Ɔhene ani sɔ ɔsomfo nyansani,
